# BodyTrackingComponent.Target

**Enumeration**

Body-tracking settings for selecting a person to track.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Target
```

## Body tracking target types

- **BodyTrackingComponent.Target.any**: Any person that is detected in front of the camera.
- **BodyTrackingComponent.Target.body(identifier:)**: A person detected by ARKit.

## Comparing targets

- **==(_:_:)**: Indicates whether two targets are equal.
- **hash(into:)**: Hashes the essential components of the target by feeding them into the given hash function.

## Selecting a body to track

- **target**: The body-tracking setting.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
